description.raw:
In this PR I address [CLOUD-93](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-93). When we press "Start one now" or \+ buttons, we change the page to launch a new constellation. To exit this page, round tabs can be clicked (if any) or a refresh had to be done.

A back button was included. This makes the user go to the "empty" page, or to the first round, if any is present.

**Note**: A center tag was changed into a div, but there was another center tag in which the change was not trivial. More information on this issue: [CLOUD-175](https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/browse/CLOUD-175)

ptal @andres_fortier

![backbtn.gif](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1956063322-backbtn.gif 'backbtn.gif')

Note: A center tag was changed into a div, but there was another center tag in which the change was not trivial. More information on this issue: CLOUD-175
